name: rock-slide
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.black-white: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.
